column4: there is a program im looking for in synaptic that will put the home and computer icon on my desktop
anyone know the name for it?
if you have gconf-editor, you can do the trick. You just have to go to the correct desktop section and set it up from there. Try searching google
I have just checked now, it's in app -> nautilus -> desktop in gconf-editor. If you don't have gconf-editor, install it
